corenlp.head_line: Buhari Orders Immediate Disengagement of Ex-Pension’s Boss, Maina, Queries Head of Service

    -> who/WP (nsubjpass)

1.content: BY OBUTE JAMES  President Muhammadu Buhari on Monday October 23, ordered the immediate disengagement of the former Chairman of the Presidential Task Force on Pension Reforms, Mr. Abdulrasheed Maina who was recently recalled.

3.content: The Special Adviser to the President on Media and Publicity, Mr. Femi Adesina, disclosed this in a statement on Monday.

2.content: Maina who is on the wanted list of the Economic and Financial Crimes commission, EFCC was recently recalled and deployed to the Ministry of Interior.

5.content: The statement read, “President Muhammadu Buhari has directed the immediate disengagement from service of Mr Abdullahi Abdulrasheed Maina, former chairman of the Presidential Task Force on Pension Reforms.

4.content: Adesina said Buhari has also directed the Head of Civil Service of the Federation, Mrs. Winifred Oyo-Ita, to submit a report on the circumstances surrounding Maina’s reinstatement to his Chief of Staff, Abba Kyari, before the close of work.

meta.headline: Buhari Orders Immediate Disengagement of Ex-Pension’s Boss, Maina, Queries Head of Service
